reference.shortdesc: The hasRelated element specifies that the contained subjects have an associative relationship with the container subject.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The hasRelated element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , processing-role, keys, and keyref.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample specifies that the myProgram application is associated with Linux and Windows. In addition, the keys attribute on the hasRelated element clarifies the type of relationship between the Linux and Windows subjects. Both subjects are platforms.
example.codeblock: <subjectScheme> <!-- Definition of subjects, including those for operating systems. --> <subjectdef keys="myProgram"> <hasRelated keys="platforms"> <subjectdef keyref="linux"/> <subjectdef keyref="windows"/> </hasRelated> </subjectdef> </subjectScheme>
